divs: sighting details on saturday the 24th of may at around 11pm i was outside having a smoke and relaxing after work. i always look up at the stars in hopes of seeing a shooting star or the northern lights and i aw these 2 balls\points of lights moving slowly across the sky. i thought they may have been a high flying plane but there was no sound and no running lights. as they got closer to being overhead the two lights split into opposite directions and took off very fast, i followed them till they were out of sight. i was not suprised or scared but more at peace with the experience. i immediatly went inside and sent an emailk to mufon's bill olinger. the objects initally were travelling ne and when they split they went nw and se.
Summary: Twin balls of lights travelling together split into opposite directions at fast speeds
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Eau Claire
There were no other sightings in Eau Claire on or around May 24th 2008
